00027 #ifdef NO_STRNLEN
00028 static size_t
00029 strnlen(const char * s, size_t maxlen) {
00030     const char * e;
00031     size_t       n;
00032 
00033     for (e = s, n = 0; *e && n < maxlen; e++, n++) {
00034         ;
00035     }
00036 
00037     return n;
00038 }
00039 
00040 #endif /* ifdef NO_STRNLEN */
00041 
00042 #ifdef NO_STRNDUP
00043 static char *
00044 strndup(const char * s, size_t n) {
00045     size_t len = strnlen(s, n);
00046     char * ret;
00047 
00048     if (len < n) {
00049         return strdup(s);
00050     }
00051 
00052     ret    = malloc(n + 1);
00053     ret[n] = '\0';
00054 
00055     strncpy(ret, s, n);
00056     return ret;
00057 }
00058 
00059 #endif /* ifdef NO_STRNDUP */

00061 unsigned char *
00062 ssl_subject_tostr(evhtp_ssl_t * ssl) {
00063     unsigned char * subj_str;
00064     char          * p;
00065     X509          * cert;
00066     X509_NAME     * name;
00067 
00068     if (!ssl) {
00069         return NULL;
00070     }
00071 
00072     if (!(cert = SSL_get_peer_certificate(ssl))) {
00073         return NULL;
00074     }
00075 
00076     if (!(name = X509_get_subject_name(cert))) {
00077         X509_free(cert);
00078         return NULL;
00079     }
00080 
00081     if (!(p = X509_NAME_oneline(name, NULL, 0))) {
00082         X509_free(cert);
00083         return NULL;
00084     }
00085 
00086     subj_str = strdup(p);
00087 
00088     OPENSSL_free(p);
00089     X509_free(cert);
00090 
00091     return subj_str;
00092 }

00096     X509          * cert;
00097     X509_NAME     * name;
00098     char          * p;
00099     unsigned char * issr_str;
00100 
00101     if (!ssl) {
00102         return NULL;
00103     }
00104 
00105     if (!(cert = SSL_get_peer_certificate(ssl))) {
00106         return NULL;
00107     }
00108 
00109     if (!(name = X509_get_issuer_name(cert))) {
00110         X509_free(cert);
00111         return NULL;
00112     }
00113 
00114     if (!(p = X509_NAME_oneline(name, NULL, 0))) {
00115         X509_free(cert);
00116         return NULL;
00117     }
00118 
00119     issr_str = strdup(p);
00120 
00121     OPENSSL_free(p);
00122     X509_free(cert);
00123 
00124     return issr_str;
00125 }

00127 unsigned char *
00128 ssl_notbefore_tostr(evhtp_ssl_t * ssl) {
00129     BIO           * bio;
00130     X509          * cert;
00131     ASN1_TIME     * time;
00132     size_t          len;
00133     unsigned char * time_str;
00134 
00135     if (!ssl) {
00136         return NULL;
00137     }
00138 
00139     if (!(cert = SSL_get_peer_certificate(ssl))) {
00140         return NULL;
00141     }
00142 
00143     if (!(time = X509_get_notBefore(cert))) {
00144         X509_free(cert);
00145         return NULL;
00146     }
00147 
00148     if (!(bio = BIO_new(BIO_s_mem()))) {
00149         X509_free(cert);
00150         return NULL;
00151     }
00152 
00153     if (!ASN1_TIME_print(bio, time)) {
00154         BIO_free(bio);
00155         X509_free(cert);
00156         return NULL;
00157     }
00158 
00159     if ((len = BIO_pending(bio)) == 0) {
00160         BIO_free(bio);
00161         X509_free(cert);
00162         return NULL;
00163     }
00164 
00165     if (!(time_str = calloc(len + 1, 1))) {
00166         return NULL;
00167     }
00168 
00169     BIO_read(bio, time_str, len);
00170 
00171     BIO_free(bio);
00172     X509_free(cert);
00173 
00174     return time_str;
00175 } /* ssl_notbefore_tostr */

00177 unsigned char *
00178 ssl_notafter_tostr(evhtp_ssl_t * ssl) {
00179     BIO           * bio;
00180     X509          * cert;
00181     ASN1_TIME     * time;
00182     size_t          len;
00183     unsigned char * time_str;
00184 
00185     if (!ssl) {
00186         return NULL;
00187     }
00188 
00189     if (!(cert = SSL_get_peer_certificate(ssl))) {
00190         return NULL;
00191     }
00192 
00193     if (!(time = X509_get_notAfter(cert))) {
00194         X509_free(cert);
00195         return NULL;
00196     }
00197 
00198     if (!(bio = BIO_new(BIO_s_mem()))) {
00199         X509_free(cert);
00200         return NULL;
00201     }
00202 
00203     if (!ASN1_TIME_print(bio, time)) {
00204         BIO_free(bio);
00205         X509_free(cert);
00206         return NULL;
00207     }
00208 
00209     if ((len = BIO_pending(bio)) == 0) {
00210         BIO_free(bio);
00211         X509_free(cert);
00212         return NULL;
00213     }
00214 
00215     if (!(time_str = calloc(len + 1, 1))) {
00216         return NULL;
00217     }
00218 
00219     BIO_read(bio, time_str, len);
00220 
00221     BIO_free(bio);
00222     X509_free(cert);
00223 
00224     return time_str;
00225 } /* ssl_notafter_tostr */

00227 unsigned char *
00228 ssl_serial_tostr(evhtp_ssl_t * ssl) {
00229     BIO           * bio;
00230     X509          * cert;
00231     size_t          len;
00232     unsigned char * ser_str;
00233 
00234     if (!ssl) {
00235         return NULL;
00236     }
00237 
00238     if (!(cert = SSL_get_peer_certificate(ssl))) {
00239         return NULL;
00240     }
00241 
00242     if (!(bio = BIO_new(BIO_s_mem()))) {
00243         X509_free(cert);
00244         return NULL;
00245     }
00246 
00247     i2a_ASN1_INTEGER(bio, X509_get_serialNumber(cert));
00248 
00249     if ((len = BIO_pending(bio)) == 0) {
00250         BIO_free(bio);
00251         X509_free(cert);
00252         return NULL;
00253     }
00254 
00255     if (!(ser_str = calloc(len + 1, 1))) {
00256         return NULL;
00257     }
00258 
00259     BIO_read(bio, ser_str, len);
00260 
00261     X509_free(cert);
00262     BIO_free(bio);
00263 
00264     return ser_str;
00265 }

00267 unsigned char *
00268 ssl_cipher_tostr(evhtp_ssl_t * ssl) {
00269     const SSL_CIPHER * cipher;
00270     const char       * p;
00271     unsigned char    * cipher_str;
00272 
00273     if (!ssl) {
00274         return NULL;
00275     }
00276 
00277     if (!(cipher = SSL_get_current_cipher(ssl))) {
00278         return NULL;
00279     }
00280 
00281     if (!(p = SSL_CIPHER_get_name(cipher))) {
00282         return NULL;
00283     }
00284 
00285     cipher_str = strdup(p);
00286 
00287     return cipher_str;
00288 }

00290 unsigned char *
00291 ssl_cert_tostr(evhtp_ssl_t * ssl) {
00292     X509          * cert;
00293     BIO           * bio;
00294     unsigned char * raw_cert_str;
00295     unsigned char * cert_str;
00296     unsigned char * p;
00297     size_t          raw_cert_len;
00298     size_t          cert_len;
00299     int             i;
00300 
00301     if (!ssl) {
00302         return NULL;
00303     }
00304 
00305     if (!(cert = SSL_get_peer_certificate(ssl))) {
00306         return NULL;
00307     }
00308 
00309     if (!(bio = BIO_new(BIO_s_mem()))) {
00310         X509_free(cert);
00311         return NULL;
00312     }
00313 
00314     if (!PEM_write_bio_X509(bio, cert)) {
00315         BIO_free(bio);
00316         X509_free(cert);
00317 
00318         return NULL;
00319     }
00320 
00321     raw_cert_len = BIO_pending(bio);
00322     raw_cert_str = calloc(raw_cert_len + 1, 1);
00323 
00324     BIO_read(bio, raw_cert_str, raw_cert_len);
00325 
00326     cert_len     = raw_cert_len - 1;
00327 
00328     for (i = 0; i < raw_cert_len - 1; i++) {
00329         if (raw_cert_str[i] == '\n') {
00330             cert_len++;
00331         }
00332     }
00333 
00334     /* 2 extra chars, one for possible last char (if not '\n'), and one for NULL terminator */
00335     cert_str = calloc(cert_len + 2, 1);
00336     p        = cert_str;
00337 
00338     for (i = 0; i < raw_cert_len - 1; i++) {
00339         *p++ = raw_cert_str[i];
00340 
00341         if (raw_cert_str[i] == '\n') {
00342             *p++ = '\t';
00343         }
00344     }
00345 
00346     /* Don't assume last character is '\n' */
00347     if (raw_cert_str[i] != '\n') {
00348         *p++ = raw_cert_str[i];
00349     }
00350 
00351     /* assert(*p == 0); */
00352 
00353     BIO_free(bio);
00354     X509_free(cert);
00355     free(raw_cert_str);
00356 
00357     return cert_str;
00358 } /* ssl_cert_tostr */
00359 
00360 unsigned char *
00361 ssl_x509_ext_tostr(evhtp_ssl_t * ssl, const char * oid) {
00362     unsigned char * ext_str;
00363     X509          * cert;
00364     ASN1_OBJECT   * oid_obj;
00365 
00366     STACK_OF(X509_EXTENSION) * exts;
00367     int                   oid_pos;
00368     X509_EXTENSION      * ext;
00369     ASN1_OCTET_STRING   * octet;
00370     const unsigned char * octet_data;
00371     long                  xlen;
00372     int                   xtag;
00373     int                   xclass;
00374 
00375     if (!ssl) {
00376         return NULL;
00377     }
00378 
00379     if (!(cert = SSL_get_peer_certificate(ssl))) {
00380         return NULL;
00381     }
00382 
00383     if (!(oid_obj = OBJ_txt2obj(oid, 1))) {
00384         X509_free(cert);
00385         return NULL;
00386     }
00387 
00388     exts    = cert->cert_info->extensions;
00389     oid_pos = X509v3_get_ext_by_OBJ(exts, oid_obj, -1);
00390 
00391     if (!(ext = X509_get_ext(cert, oid_pos))) {
00392         ASN1_OBJECT_free(oid_obj);
00393         X509_free(cert);
00394         return NULL;
00395     }
00396 
00397     if (!(octet = X509_EXTENSION_get_data(ext))) {
00398         ASN1_OBJECT_free(oid_obj);
00399         X509_free(cert);
00400         return NULL;
00401     }
00402 
00403     octet_data = octet->data;
00404 
00405     if (ASN1_get_object(&octet_data, &xlen, &xtag, &xclass, octet->length)) {
00406         ASN1_OBJECT_free(oid_obj);
00407         X509_free(cert);
00408         return NULL;
00409     }
00410 
00411     /* We're only supporting string data. Could optionally add support
00412      * for encoded binary data */
00413 
00414     if (xlen > 0 && xtag == 0x0C && octet->type == V_ASN1_OCTET_STRING) {
00415         ext_str = strndup(octet_data, xlen);
00416     }
00417 
00418     ASN1_OBJECT_free(oid_obj);
00419     X509_free(cert);
00420 
00421     return ext_str;
00422 } /* ssl_x509_ext_tostr */

00424 int
00425 ssl_x509_verifyfn(int ok, X509_STORE_CTX * store) {
00426     char                 buf[256];
00427     X509               * err_cert;
00428     int                  err;
00429     int                  depth;
00430     SSL                * ssl;
00431     evhtp_connection_t * connection;
00432     evhtp_ssl_cfg_t    * ssl_cfg;
00433 
00434     err_cert   = X509_STORE_CTX_get_current_cert(store);
00435     err        = X509_STORE_CTX_get_error(store);
00436     depth      = X509_STORE_CTX_get_error_depth(store);
00437     ssl        = X509_STORE_CTX_get_ex_data(store, SSL_get_ex_data_X509_STORE_CTX_idx());
00438 
00439     X509_NAME_oneline(X509_get_subject_name(err_cert), buf, 256);
00440 
00441     connection = SSL_get_app_data(ssl);
00442     ssl_cfg    = connection->htp->ssl_cfg;
00443 
00444     if (depth > ssl_cfg->verify_depth) {
00445         ok  = 0;
00446         err = X509_V_ERR_CERT_CHAIN_TOO_LONG;
00447 
00448         X509_STORE_CTX_set_error(store, err);
00449     }
00450 
00451     if (!ok) {
00452         rproxy_t * rproxy;
00453 
00454         rproxy = evthr_get_aux(connection->thread);
00455         assert(rproxy != NULL);
00456 
00457         logger_log_error(rproxy->logger,
00458                          "[WARN] SSL: verify error:num=%d:%s:depth=%d:%s\n", err,
00459                          X509_verify_cert_error_string(err), depth, buf);
00460     }
00461 
00462     return ok;
00463 }

00467     return 1;
